spiritsExplanation:
The workout 'All in One Row' features interval training with a maximum rhythm of 32 and a high intensity level (3 out of 3), indicating a strong High-Energy & Intense spirit (score: 0.7). The inclusion of 2-minute rowing intervals suggests an energetic and challenging experience. Additionally, the music playlist includes upbeat and popular 90s tracks which enhances the dynamic nature of the session.

The presence of rhythmic music and the structured nature of interval rowing contribute to a Flow & Rhythm spirit (score: 0.6), as it emphasizes coordination and music-driven pacing.

Given the visual setting on the water, the Outdoor & Adventure spirit is highly relevant (score: 0.8). The outdoor rowing environment naturally aligns with exploration and adventure themes, embodying the spirit of nature-based workouts.
